actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Government Operations.
Measure passed Senate, amended, roll call #219 (64-21).
Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: An original bill to require that future appointments to the offices of Director and Deputy Director of the Office of Management and Budget, and of certain other officers in the Executive Office of the President, be subject to confirmation by the Senate.

summary.text: Requires that future appointments to the offices of Director and Deputy Director of the Office of Management and Budget, the Executive Director of the Domestic Council, and the Executive Secretary of the National Security Council be subject to confirmation by the Senate.

titles.title: An original bill to require that future appointments to the offices of Director and Deputy Director of the Office of Management and Budget, and of certain other officers in the Executive Office of the President, be subject to confirmation by the Senate.
